title: Overworld Map
description: World map system showing a game's overworld for easy travel between large regions or levels.
longDescription:
RPG Overworld Map


Elevate your game's exploration and navigation with the RPG Overworld Map asset for Unreal Engine 5! This powerful tool allows you to create a fully customizable and interactive map widget that enhances your players' gaming experience.


Key Features:

  • Zoomable and Draggable Map: Effortlessly zoom in and out and drag the map to explore every corner of your game world.
  • Easy Teleport Location Customization: Quickly set up and customize teleport locations to transport players to new areas with ease.
  • Highly Customizable: Personalize the map's appearance and behavior to fit your game's unique style and mechanics.


Perfect for:

  • Open-world RPGs
  • Adventure games
  • Strategy games
  • Any game that requires a comprehensive and interactive map system


Get ready to take your players on an unforgettable journey with the RPG Overworld Map asset!


Demo Link:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DXv2dWjmlB4


Discord Support:

https://discord.gg/as4HUeAwm2


Changelog:


v1.0:

  • First release.

v1.1:

  • Common UI
  • Gamepad Support
  • Teleport Replication
  • The project will be upgraded to 5.4 in the future however a version for 5.3 will be added.



PS: *The demo includes sample art, fake loading screen with an easy to use dissolve material.*


This asset is a work in progress and will receive more features as its being developed to provide a stable world map system with the features needed in modern games.


Documentation/Integration Guide Link: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TVrgH8tuiewQFsFjZswVuupmLYHqM3k_bD18UZdT7Ko/
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Map Points
  • Details Panel
  • World Map Name
  • Fake Loading Screen
  • Dissolve VFX
  • Draggable Map
  • Zoomable Map
  • Common UI
  • Gamepad Support
  • Replicated Teleport

Number of Blueprints: 11

Input: Mouse

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Untested

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TVrgH8tuiewQFsFjZswVuupmLYHqM3k_bD18UZdT7Ko/

Important/Additional Notes:
